alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Highland; Pickaway; Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 4:57AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF FAYETTE, EASTERN CLINTON, SOUTHWESTERN PICKAWAY, NORTHWESTERN PIKE, SOUTHEASTERN GREENE, CENTRAL HIGHLAND AND WESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 530 AM EDT... At 457 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Leesburg, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Wilmington, Hillsboro, Greenfield, Sabina, Jamestown, Lynchburg, Leesburg, New Vienna, Marshall, Williamsport, Bloomingburg, Bainbridge, New Holland, Highland Holiday, Rocky Fork Point, Cynthiana, Russell, New Jasper, and Staunton. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 52 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Highland; Pickaway; Pike; Ross
